description: This file demonstrates the use of a LiteRAG system with custom embeddings and a mock LLM, including ingestion of a document and querying.

classes.name: LiteRAG
classes.description: An implementation of a Retrieval-Augmented Generation system integrating embedding, vector store, and LLM.

classes.name: MemoryVectorStore
classes.description: A simple in-memory vector store for storing and retrieving embeddings.

classes.name: CustomEmbeddings
classes.description: A class representing custom embedding logic using a provided embedding function.

classes.name: CustomLLM
classes.description: A class simulating a language model with a custom prompt response function.

methods.name: toyEmbedder(texts)
methods.description: A simple character-gram based embedding function for demonstration.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: The main async function that initializes the retrieval system, ingests a document, and performs a query.
